input: We implemented blockchain for supply chain tracking but still rely on Excel for actual logistics management.
Our AI chatbot handles 90% of customer inquiries with full backend integration.

We added NFT rewards to our loyalty program but saw no increase in engagement.
The machine learning system predicts inventory needs with 95% accuracy.
